title: Rahu Transit in the 6th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the sixth house sharpens competitive drive, problem-solving ability, and survival instincts for Leo ascendants. Enemies, obstacles, and work pressure surface clearly, pushing you to confront issues head-on. This phase favors strategic victories, unconventional methods, and mastery over routines. Health requires disciplined habits, as stress can spike. When ambition is channelled into service and structure, Rahu delivers decisive wins over challenges.

sections.heading: Career
points: Success in competitive or high-pressure roles

sections.heading: Finance
points: Earnings linked to service or problem-solving

closing: This transit empowers you to defeat obstacles. With discipline and strategy, Rahu turns challenges into clear victories.
